title: problem starting my game.
body:

replies.body:
yes POROCLES 
you were right thanks so much it help out a lot. I can finally play ty!!!

Kernal errors like this are commonly due to a security setting with your OS that's blocking the patcher from launching and scanning files.  Go through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
